task.title: How to bold your text in a Microsoft Word document.
task.shortdesc: Here you will learn how to bold your selected text in a Microsoft Word document.

prereq.p: Your Word Application have to be installed on your device and you have to have a Microsoft Word document on which you can work on.

context.p: This task can help you when you want to grab the reader's attention.
This task can also show which information is important to be known from the reader.

step.cmd: Select the text which you want to be made bold.
Right click on the text and select the bold option.

result.p: The selected text is bolded successfully in your document!

example.p: You can bold your text when you want to say something important!
